entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Flurries or rain showers this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
